chain_of_thought.description: Analyzing dispute scenario:  At the customer's doorstep, a dispute arises over a spilled drink. It is unclear whether the cause is poor merchant packaging or driver mishandling , creating a real-time conflict that risks a poor review for the driver  and a frustrating support experience for the customer.
chain_of_thought.reasoning: Analyzed scenario and routed to customer_agent

It is unclear whether the cause is poor merchant packaging or driver mishandling , creating a real-time conflict that risks a poor review for the driver  and a frustrating support experience for the customer.

AI analyzed evidence for fault determination

Sent final resolution notification to all parties
